verses.esv: 8 Finally, all of you, have unity of mind, sympathy, brotherly love, a tender heart, and a humble mind.
verses.kjv: 8 Finally, be ye all of one mind, having compassion one of another, love as brethren, be pitiful, be courteous:
verses.niv: 8 Finally, all of you, live in harmony with one another; be sympathetic, love as brothers, be compassionate and humble.

verses.esv: 15 Rejoice with those who rejoice, weep with those who weep.
verses.kjv: 15 Rejoice with them that do rejoice, and weep with them that weep.
verses.niv: 15 Rejoice with those who rejoice; mourn with those who mourn.

verses.esv:
61:1   The Spirit of the Lord GOD is upon me,
    because the LORD has anointed me
  to bring good news to the poor;
    he has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted,
  to proclaim liberty to the captives,
    and the opening of the prison to those who are bound;
verses.kjv: 1 The Spirit of the Lord GOD is upon me; because the LORD hath anointed me to preach good tidings unto the meek; he hath sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim liberty to the captives, and the opening of the prison to them that are bound;
verses.niv: 1 The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to preach good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners,

verses.kjv: 8 Look to yourselves, that we lose not those things which we have wrought, but that we receive a full reward.
verses.niv: 1 The elder,

verses.esv: 17 I appeal to you, brothers, to watch out for those who cause divisions and create obstacles contrary to the doctrine that you have been taught; avoid them.
verses.kjv: 17 Now I beseech you, brethren, mark them which cause divisions and offences contrary to the doctrine which ye have learned; and avoid them.
verses.niv: 17 I urge you, brothers, to watch out for those who cause divisions and put obstacles in your way that are contrary to the teaching you have learned. Keep away from them.

verses.esv: 5 Keep your life free from love of money, and be content with what you have, for he has said, “I will never leave you nor forsake you.”
verses.kjv: 5 Let your conversation be without covetousness; and be content with such things as ye have: for he hath said, I will never leave thee, nor forsake thee.
verses.niv: 5 Keep your lives free from the love of money and be content with what you have, because God has said, "Never will I leave you; never will I forsake you."

verses.esv: 8 but God shows his love for us in that while we were still sinners, Christ died for us.
verses.kjv: 8 But God commendeth his love toward us, in that, while we were yet sinners, Christ died for us.
verses.niv: 8 But God demonstrates his own love for us in this: While we were still sinners, Christ died for us.

verses.esv: 16 “For God so loved the world, that he gave his only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish but have eternal life.
verses.kjv: 16 For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.
verses.niv: 16 "For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.

verses.esv: 10 As for a person who stirs up division, after warning him once and then twice, have nothing more to do with him,
verses.kjv: 10 A man that is an heretick after the first and second admonition reject;
verses.niv: 10 Warn a divisive person once, and then warn him a second time. After that, have nothing to do with him.

verses.esv: 15:1 We who are strong have an obligation to bear with the failings of the weak, and not to please ourselves.
verses.kjv: 1 We then that are strong ought to bear the infirmities of the weak, and not to please ourselves.
verses.niv: 1 We who are strong ought to bear with the failings of the weak and not to please ourselves.

verses.esv: 17 But if anyone has the world’s goods and sees his brother in need, yet closes his heart against him, how does God’s love abide in him?
verses.kjv: 17 But whoso hath this world’s good, and seeth his brother have need, and shutteth up his bowels of compassion from him, how dwelleth the love of God in him?
verses.niv: 17 If anyone has material possessions and sees his brother in need but has no pity on him, how can the love of God be in him?

verses.esv: 32 Be kind to one another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, as God in Christ forgave you.
verses.kjv: 32 And be ye kind one to another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, even as God for Christ’s sake hath forgiven you.
verses.niv: 32 Be kind and compassionate to one another, forgiving each other, just as in Christ God forgave you.

verses.esv: 13 I can do all things through him who strengthens me.
verses.kjv: 13 I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
verses.niv: 13 I can do everything through him who gives me strength.

verses.esv: 26 But the Helper, the Holy Spirit, whom the Father will send in my name, he will teach you all things and bring to your remembrance all that I have said to you.
verses.kjv: 26 But the Comforter, which is the Holy Ghost, whom the Father will send in my name, he shall teach you all things, and bring all things to your remembrance, whatsoever I have said unto you.
verses.niv: 26 But the Counselor, the Holy Spirit, whom the Father will send in my name, will teach you all things and will remind you of everything I have said to you.

verses.esv: 16 But I say, walk by the Spirit, and you will not gratify the desires of the flesh.
verses.kjv: 16 This I say then, Walk in the Spirit, and ye shall not fulfil the lust of the flesh.
verses.niv: 16 So I say, live by the Spirit, and you will not gratify the desires of the sinful nature.

verses.esv: 7 casting all your anxieties on him, because he cares for you.
verses.kjv: 7 Casting all your care upon him; for he careth for you.
verses.niv: 7 Cast all your anxiety on him because he cares for you.

verses.esv: 8 Above all, keep loving one another earnestly, since love covers a multitude of sins.
verses.kjv: 8 And above all things have fervent charity among yourselves: for charity shall cover the multitude of sins.
verses.niv: 8 Above all, love each other deeply, because love covers over a multitude of sins.

verses.esv:
3   “Do two walk together,
    unless they have agreed to meet?
verses.kjv: 3 Can two walk together, except they be agreed?
verses.niv: 3 Do two walk together unless they have agreed to do so?

verses.esv:
24   Gracious words are like a honeycomb,
    sweetness to the soul and health to the body.
verses.kjv: 24 Pleasant words are as an honeycomb, sweet to the soul, and health to the bones.
verses.niv: 24 Pleasant words are a honeycomb, sweet to the soul and healing to the bones.

verses.esv: 6 If we say we have fellowship with him while we walk in darkness, we lie and do not practice the truth.
verses.kjv: 6 If we say that we have fellowship with him, and walk in darkness, we lie, and do not the truth:
verses.niv: 6 If we claim to have fellowship with him yet walk in the darkness, we lie and do not live by the truth.

verses.esv: 2 Do not be conformed to this world, but be transformed by the renewal of your mind, that by testing you may discern what is the will of God, what is good and acceptable and perfect.
verses.kjv: 2 And be not conformed to this world: but be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind, that ye may prove what is that good, and acceptable, and perfect, will of God.
verses.niv: 2 Do not conform any longer to the pattern of this world, but be transformed by the renewing of your mind. Then you will be able to test and approve what God's will is--his good, pleasing and perfect will.

verses.esv: 28 Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood. 29 I know that after my departure fierce wolves will come in among you, not sparing the flock; 30 and from among your own selves will arise men speaking twisted things, to draw away the disciples after them. 31 Therefore be alert, remembering that for three years I did not cease night or day to admonish every one with tears.
verses.kjv: 28 Take heed therefore unto yourselves, and to all the flock, over the which the Holy Ghost hath made you overseers, to feed the church of God, which he hath purchased with his own blood. 29 For I know this, that after my departing shall grievous wolves enter in among you, not sparing the flock. 30 Also of your own selves shall men arise, speaking perverse things, to draw away disciples after them. 31 Therefore watch, and remember, that by the space of three years I ceased not to warn every one night and day with tears.
verses.niv: 28 Keep watch over yourselves and all the flock of which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers. Be shepherds of the church of God, which he bought with his own blood. 29 I know that after I leave, savage wolves will come in among you and will not spare the flock. 30 Even from your own number men will arise and distort the truth in order to draw away disciples after them. 31 So be on your guard! Remember that for three years I never stopped warning each of you night and day with tears.

verses.esv: 15 Do not regard him as an enemy, but warn him as a brother.
verses.kjv: 15 Yet count him not as an enemy, but admonish him as a brother.
verses.niv: 15 Yet do not regard him as an enemy, but warn him as a brother.

verses.esv: 20 I have been crucified with Christ. It is no longer I who live, but Christ who lives in me. And the life I now live in the flesh I live by faith in the Son of God, who loved me and gave himself for me.
verses.kjv: 20 I am crucified with Christ: nevertheless I live; yet not I, but Christ liveth in me: and the life which I now live in the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God, who loved me, and gave himself for me.
verses.niv: 20 I have been crucified with Christ and I no longer live, but Christ lives in me. The life I live in the body, I live by faith in the Son of God, who loved me and gave himself for me.

verses.esv: 33 just as I try to please everyone in everything I do, not seeking my own advantage, but that of many, that they may be saved.
verses.kjv: 33 Even as I please all men in all things, not seeking mine own profit, but the profit of many, that they may be saved.
verses.niv: 33 even as I try to please everybody in every way. For I am not seeking my own good but the good of many, so that they may be saved.
